biography_text: ISSA, Darrell, a Representative from California; born in Cleveland, Cuyahoga County, Ohio, November 1, 1953; B.A., Siena Heights College, Adrian, Mich., 1976; United States Army, 1970-1980; business owner; elected as a Republican to the One Hundred Seventh and to the eight succeeding Congresses (January 3, 2001-present); chairman, Committee on Oversight and Government Reform (One Hundred Twelfth and One Hundred Thirteenth Congresses).
